title: 142 The Fascinating Future of Crime, Hackers, and How to Protect Your Information with Marc Goodman
description:
"The more things we connect to the internet, the more things there are to hack." - Marc Goodman
If you enjoyed this episode, check out links, show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/142.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
